edges.document_title: United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell — Indictment (20 Cr. 330)
edges.quote_snippet: Ghislaine Maxwell assisted, facilitated, and contributed to Jeffrey Epstein's abuse of minor girls by, among other things, helping Epstein to recruit, groom, and ultimately abuse victims known to Maxwell and Epstein to be under the age of eighteen.

edges.document_title: United States v. Epstein — Non-Prosecution Agreement (2007)
edges.quote_snippet: Sarah Kellen named as potential co-conspirator in the Non-Prosecution Agreement.

edges.document_title: United States v. Epstein — Non-Prosecution Agreement (2007)
edges.quote_snippet: Nadia Marcinkova identified as potential co-conspirator in the Non-Prosecution Agreement.

edges.document_title: United States v. Epstein — Non-Prosecution Agreement (2007)

Larry Visoski testified he served as Epstein's personal pilot for approximately 25 years.

edges.document_title: EFTA00313875 — Hyperion Air Passenger Manifests, Flight Logs
edges.quote_snippet: David Rodgers maintained handwritten flight logs for Epstein's aircraft.

edges.document_title: United States v. Maxwell — Trial Transcript, Testimony of Juan Alessi
edges.quote_snippet: Juan Alessi testified he worked as house manager at Epstein's Palm Beach residence for approximately eleven years.

edges.document_title: SDFL Case Records — Alfredo Rodriguez Obstruction Case
edges.quote_snippet: Alfredo Rodriguez convicted of obstruction of justice for attempting to sell Epstein's personal phone directory.

edges.document_title: United States v. Maxwell — Trial Transcript, Testimony of Haley Robson
edges.quote_snippet: Haley Robson testified about being recruited and subsequently recruiting other girls to provide massages at Epstein's Palm Beach residence.

edges.document_title: United States v. Maxwell — Superseding Indictment (S2 20 Cr. 330)
edges.quote_snippet: Virginia Giuffre identified in court filings as a victim recruited by Ghislaine Maxwell for Jeffrey Epstein beginning around 1999-2000.

edges.document_title: United States v. Maxwell — Superseding Indictment
edges.quote_snippet: Maria Farmer identified as a victim who reported abuse by Epstein and Maxwell to the FBI in 1996.

edges.document_title: United States v. Maxwell — Trial Transcript, Testimony of Annie Farmer
edges.quote_snippet: Annie Farmer testified that Maxwell and Epstein sexually abused her when she was sixteen years old during a visit to Epstein's New Mexico ranch.
Sarah Ransome filed a civil suit detailing allegations of sexual abuse by Epstein on his private island.

edges.document_title: SDNY Victim Impact Statements — Jennifer Araoz
edges.quote_snippet: Jennifer Araoz submitted a victim impact statement describing abuse by Epstein beginning when she was fourteen years old.

edges.document_title: Doe v. United States — CVRA Litigation (SDFL)
edges.quote_snippet: Attorney Bradley Edwards filed a Crime Victims' Rights Act suit challenging the Epstein Non-Prosecution Agreement on behalf of victims.

edges.document_title: DOJ OPR Review — Epstein Non-Prosecution Agreement
edges.quote_snippet: AUSA Marie Villafana handled the original federal investigation and negotiation of the Non-Prosecution Agreement with Epstein's counsel.

edges.document_title: United States v. Maxwell — Case Docket, Prosecution Team
edges.quote_snippet: AUSA Maurene Comey served as a member of the prosecution team in United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell.

Sarah Kellen referenced in Maxwell indictment as an associate who assisted in scheduling victims for Epstein.

edges.document_title: United States v. Maxwell — Superseding Indictment
edges.quote_snippet: Maxwell recruited and groomed Virginia Giuffre for sexual abuse by Epstein.

edges.document_title: Southern Trust Company — Deutsche Bank Records
edges.quote_snippet: $5M, $7M, $13M, $15M, $20M payments through Southern Trust from Black Family Partners, LP (2014–2015).

edges.document_title: DOJ Case Files — Financial Relationship Records
edges.quote_snippet: Les Wexner granted Epstein broad power of attorney over his financial affairs. Wexner gifted the 71st Street Manhattan mansion to Epstein.

edges.document_title: The Haze Trust & LSJE LLC — Formation Documents
edges.quote_snippet: Trustees: Jeffrey Epstein & Darren K. Indyke. The Haze Trust created Feb 9, 1999. LSJE LLC formed October 27, 2011, Agent: Darren K. Indyke.

edges.document_title: Black Family Partners — Financial Transaction Records
edges.quote_snippet: Richard Joslin coordinated multiple $5M–$20M transfers between Black Family Partners LP and Southern Trust Company (2014–2015).

Welcome letter prepared for Dasha Burak arrival at 2G apartment, 301 East 66th Street NYC, June 1, 2019 — 5 days before Epstein's arrest.

Kitten deposit arranged via Bella Klein. Karyna coordinated with Bella on financial payments and procurement.
Karyna and Cashkim Bussue documented infrastructure inspection on island June 18, 2019 while Epstein was in Paris.
Both Karyna and Luciano Fontanilla CC'd on Epstein travel schedule emails from Lesley Groff.
LM for Bill Richardson on his personal cell. Janis says Richardson is traveling today. Coordinated by Lesley Groff.
Mickey called to follow up on this on behalf of Governor Richardson. Wanted to follow up with the proposal.

Tom Pritzker named in Virginia Giuffre testimony (2016) — accused under oath of sexual coercion. Pritzker vehemently denies allegations.
Apollo Management transactions routed through Southern Trust Company managed by Darren Indyke. $5M–$20M payments 2014–2015.
Richard Joslin served as financial coordinator for Black Family Partners LP, managing transfers to Epstein entities.
Alan Dershowitz named in Virginia Giuffre civil filings. Dershowitz denied all allegations and counter-sued.
Dershowitz named alongside Maxwell in multiple court filings related to the Epstein case.

Fiona Cameron-Williams scheduled by Lesley Groff for 71st Street property management tasks.
Darren Indyke PLLC offices at 10B, Richard Kahn receives maintenance checks for 10N. Both at 301 East 66th Street.
Jean-Luc Brunel and Ghislaine Maxwell both referenced in court filings as associates who facilitated access to young women.

edges.document_title: DOJ Files — Prince Andrew References (hundreds of mentions)
edges.quote_snippet: Prince Andrew named hundreds of times across DOJ releases including private emails, Buckingham Palace dinner invitation, and photographs.

edges.document_title: Giuffre v. Prince Andrew — Civil Lawsuit (settled 2022)
edges.quote_snippet: Virginia Giuffre filed civil suit against Prince Andrew alleging sexual abuse. Settled out of court for reported $12M.
Prince Andrew and Ghislaine Maxwell documented as longtime friends. Maxwell introduced Andrew to Epstein.
Sarah Ferguson received $18,000 from Epstein via Prince Andrew to settle debts. Ferguson acknowledged payment publicly.
Flight logs document at least 17 flights with Clinton aboard to Siberia, Morocco, China, Armenia, and Africa.
Ghislaine Maxwell documented on multiple flights alongside Bill Clinton on Epstein aircraft.
Trump flew at least seven times on Epstein private jet in four-year period in the 1990s per released flight logs.
Bill Gates met with Epstein multiple times between 2011-2014 after conviction. Gates later called meetings "a huge mistake."
Kevin Spacey documented on Epstein plane for Africa trip with Clinton, Chris Tucker in 2002.
Chris Tucker documented on Epstein plane for Africa trip with Clinton, Kevin Spacey in 2002.
Spacey and Clinton on same Epstein flights to Africa in 2002 per passenger manifests.
Tucker and Clinton on same Epstein flights to Africa in 2002 per passenger manifests.
Woody Allen and wife on flight manifest March 23, 2014. Calendar documents 9+ trips including to NM ranch and Palm Beach.
Naomi Campbell appears in Epstein flight logs and attended social events at Epstein properties.

edges.document_title: DOJ Files — St. James Island Conference 2006
edges.quote_snippet: Stephen Hawking attended a physics conference hosted by Epstein on his Caribbean island in 2006.

edges.document_title: DOJ Files — Epstein Emails Mentioning Branson
edges.quote_snippet: Richard Branson named in Epstein documents and emails in DOJ file releases.
David Copperfield named in Virginia Giuffre testimony as having visited Epstein island.
Glenn Dubin named in Giuffre allegations and documented as longtime Epstein associate. Dubin denied all allegations.
Virginia Giuffre named Glenn Dubin in sworn testimony. Dubin vehemently denied allegations.
Former Senate Majority Leader George Mitchell named in Giuffre testimony. Mitchell denied all allegations.
Virginia Giuffre named George Mitchell under oath. Mitchell denied allegations through spokesperson.
Lawrence Summers appeared in Epstein flight logs and documented meetings post-conviction.

edges.document_title: DOJ Files — Musk Email to Epstein

Elon Musk photographed alongside Ghislaine Maxwell at 2014 event. Musk says it was a random photo.
Virginia Giuffre testified about encounter with Matt Groening on Epstein plane.
Peter Mandelson named in Epstein files with meetings documented. Mandelson denied any impropriety.

edges.document_title: DOJ File Release — Jagger Name Appearance

Reid Hoffman met with Epstein after conviction. Hoffman later publicly apologized for the association.
